Uses of Class
org.ow2.bonita.facade.exception.RoleNotFoundException

Packages that use RoleNotFoundException
org.ow2.bonita.facade Contains interfaces for accessing Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.exception Contains exception classes thrown by Bonita APIs. 
org.ow2.bonita.facade.internal All interfaces in this package are for internal use only. 
 

Uses of RoleNotFoundException in org.ow2.bonita.facade
 

Methods in org.ow2.bonita.facade that throw RoleNotFoundException
 void IdentityAPI.addRoleToUser(String roleName, String username)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.addMembershipToUser(String, String) instead with a membership obtained with IdentityAPI.getMembershipForRoleAndGroup(String, String) and the default group IdentityAPI.DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME
 Role IdentityAPI.findRoleByName(String name)
          Retrieve a role from its name
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getAllUsersInRole(String roleUUID)
          Retrieve all the users in a role
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getAllUsersInRoleAndGroup(String roleUUID, String groupUUID)
          Retrieve all the users in a given role inside a group.
 Membership IdentityAPI.getMembershipForRoleAndGroup(String roleUUID, String groupUUID)
          Obtain the Membership for a role and a group (either it's an existing membership or it's created if the role and group exist)
 Role IdentityAPI.getRole(String name)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.findRoleByName(String) instead
 Role IdentityAPI.getRoleByUUID(String roleUUID)
          Retrieve a role from its UUID
 List<Role> IdentityAPI.getRolesByUUIDs(Collection<String> roleUUIDs)
          Retrieve a list of roles
 Set<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInRole(String roleName)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.getAllUsersInRoleAndGroup(String, String) instead with the default group IdentityAPI.DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInRole(String roleUUID, int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers)
          Retrieve a limited number of the users in a role (for paginated UI)
 List<User> IdentityAPI.getUsersInRole(String roleUUID, int fromIndex, int numberOfUsers, UserCriterion pagingCriterion)
          Retrieve a limited number of the users in a role (for paginated UI)
 void IdentityAPI.removeRole(String name)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.removeRoleByUUID(String) instead
 void IdentityAPI.removeRoleByUUID(String roleUUID)
          Permanently remove a role
 void IdentityAPI.removeRoleFromUser(String roleName, String username)
          Deprecated. use org.ow2.bonita.facade.IdentityAPI.removeMembershipFromUser instead with a membership obtained with IdentityAPI.getMembershipForRoleAndGroup(String, String) and the default group IdentityAPI.DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME
 void IdentityAPI.removeRoles(Collection<String> roleUUIDs)
          Permanently remove a collection of roles
 void IdentityAPI.setUserRoles(String username, Set<String> roleNames)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.setUserMemberships(String, Collection) instead with memberships obtained with IdentityAPI.getMembershipForRoleAndGroup(String, String) and the default group IdentityAPI.DEFAULT_GROUP_NAME
 Role IdentityAPI.updateRole(String oldName, String name, String label, String description)
          Deprecated. use IdentityAPI.updateRoleByUUID(String, String, String, String) instead
 Role IdentityAPI.updateRoleByUUID(String roleUUID, String name, String label, String description)
          Update a role
